title: Mobile Third-Person Shooter Afterpulse(TM) Launched Worldwide on App Store
text:
Companies mentioned in this article: GAMEVIL USA, Inc. 
LOS ANGELES, Oct. 22, 2015 /PRNewswire-iReach/ -- Digital Legends Entertainment and GAMEVIL have announced the worldwide launch of Afterpulse (TM), a multiplayer third-person shooter that utilizes the latest mobile development technology to transport players into a post-apocalyptic urban battlefield. Developed by Digital Legends Entertainment and published by GAMEVIL, Afterpulse is now available for free download everywhere on App Store. 
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151021/279046 
In addition to Apple's Metal API and full 64-bit support, the game uses full physically based deferred rendering, HDR post processing and skeletal animations with ragdolls to create true-to-life movements and photorealistic lighting, shadows, smoke and crossfire. 
"We are thrilled with this partnership that brings worldwide live operations expertise and a deep understanding of Asian markets. It is the right match to position and service Afterpulse as a product with global reach," says Xavier Carrillo-Costa, CEO and Founder of Digital Legends Entertainment. "Learnings from four previous generations of shooters for mobile have allowed us to make key decisions for Afterpulse on camera, controls, enemies and combat, and to find the right balance between run and aim action. With Afterpulse we have achieved a genuine and definitive mobile shooter experience." 
Along with its top-notch graphics, Afterpulse also boasts enhanced online matchmaking for live free-for-all battles and 8-player Team Deathmatch games. Using zone server technology, each match is made with optimal player experience in mind. 
GAMEVIL USA President Kyu Lee says, "We knew as soon as we saw Afterpulse that it would push the boundaries of mobile gaming. It not only has realistic graphics, but it also provides the perfect environment for a competitive online community. As a third-person shooter, the game is new territory for GAMEVIL, but our experience with online multiplayer games made this a natural fit." 
When players aren't battling in multiplayer matches, they can expand and personalize their arsenal and hone in their shooting skills through quick two-and-a-half minute training sessions. Players can choose their own battle style with seven types of weapons - Handgun, Shotgun, Assault, SMG, LMG, Sniper and Rockets - and power up, combine and evolve their firearms for limitless possibilities. 
Starting now until October 29, 2015 at 11:59 pm PDT, new players can download and log in to Afterpulse to receive 250 Gold (valued at 10 USD) and a 4-star iOS-exclusive Elite Operator Cap that provides increased protection against SMGs. 
Afterpulse is now available worldwide on App Store. 
Download Afterpulse on App Store: http://bit.ly/Afterpulse

ABOUT DIGITAL LEGENDS ENTERTAINMENT 
Digital Legends Entertainment is one of the world's leading AAA mobile game developers that delivers superb gaming experience to smart phones, tablets and connected TVs across all operating systems powered by its proprietary Karisma Engine. 
Digital Legends Entertainment is recognized for its own state-of-the-art multi-platform technology, its in-depth game development experience and its original IP designs such as the award-winning games Kroll and the AAA free-to-play title The Respawnables.

ABOUT GAMEVIL 
GAMEVIL, with over 500 million game downloads and experience publishing hundreds of games on multiple platforms, is one of the most active and innovative mobile game companies in the world. Established in 2000 and with offices in Seoul, Los Angeles, Tokyo, Beijing, Singapore, Taipei, and Berlin, GAMEVIL is an experienced global mobile game publisher working with more than 70 top studios around the world. 
With deep industry and regional knowledge, GAMEVIL has been able to craft numerous award winners through a diverse portfolio of games. Backed by unparalleled expertise in mobile, GAMEVIL continues to lead the sector with a commitment to establishing mobile gaming as a way of life.
